title: How to Prevent Downloading on Google Drive on PC or Mac

steps.title: Go to https://drive.google.com.
steps.content: Go to https://drive.google.com . This opens the contents of your Google Drive. If you’re not signed in, click Go to Google Drive to sign in now.

steps.title: Right-click a shared file.
steps.content: Right-click a shared file. A menu will appear.

steps.title: Click Share….
steps.content: Click Share… . You’ll see the Share with Others window.

steps.title: Click Advanced.
steps.content: Click Advanced . It’s at the bottom-right corner of the window.

steps.title: Check the box next to “Disable options to download, print, and copy for commenters and viewers.
steps.content: Check the box next to “Disable options to download, print, and copy for commenters and viewers.

steps.title: Click Done.
steps.content: Click Done . You’ve now disabled downloads for the selected file.
